restructureit.refactorings.processors

Class EncapsulateCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtField<?>>
      • restructureit.refactorings.processors.EncapsulateCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    spoon.processing.FactoryAccessor, spoon.processing.Processor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtField<?>>

    public class EncapsulateCollection
extends spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtField<?>>
    Performs the refactoring Encapsulate Collection. It makes a collection field private and adds getter giving unmodifiable reference add method and remove method. Reference: https://refactoring.com/catalog/encapsulateCollection.html

      Type Factory to generate CtElement Types.
